summary: Alternating between the past and the present, a precocious little girl sues her selfish, career-driven parents for emancipation, surprising them both.
cast: Ryan O'Neal|Shelley Long|Drew Barrymore|Sam Wanamaker|Allen Garfield|Sharon Stone|Hortensia Colorado|Kim Marriner|Wendy Gordon|Ken Gale|Deborah Cody|Marc May|Steven K. Miller|Annie Meyers-Shyer|Lauren Hartman|David Paymer|Larry Marko|Lorinne Vozoff|David Graf|Ida Random|Steffen Zacharias|Laura Campbell|Jenny Gago|Verna Cornelius|Johna Stewart-Bowden|David D'Arnal|Don Benjamin|Jaid Barrymore|Kelly Lange|Rex Reed|Irving Meyers|William A. Fraker|Beverly Reed|Eloise Hardt|Art Bradley|Stuart Pankin|Laura Coker|Gregory Hodal|Carl Byrd|Luana Anders|Richard Minchenberg|Charlotte Stewart|Dana Kaminski|Arlin Miller|Ken Lerner|Minnie Summers Lindsey|Mimi Craven|Douglas DuVal|Ellen Geer|Molly Hansen|Robert Dominick Jones|Helen Mallory
title: Diferencias irreconciliables
